name: No Name Yet
description:
No Description Yet! JK, I actually have one.

This is a visual novel I made using Renpy.

This is the story of someone who is about to lose his job and be replaced by automated machines, or something like that.

Of course I spent time working on the story, but most of the time I spent was on the way the player and the game interact with each other, which led to some interesting(maybe? hopefully so) results. See for yourself. 

The game is not very long. I guess that is good for people who don't have a lot of free time.<-What a nice excuse for my laziness!
